eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\frac{d}{d(n\cdot x)}G_H[g_H(n\cdot x,n\cdot y,\kappa)]
=
\left[\frac{d}{d(n\cdot x)}g_H(n\cdot x,n\cdot y,\kappa)\right]
G_H[g_H(n\cdot x,n\cdot y,\kappa)],
\label{functional}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\left[i(\gamma\cdot n)\frac{d}{d(n\cdot x)}g_H(n\cdot x,n\cdot
y,\kappa) +\gamma\cdot\kappa+\gamma\cdot A(n\cdot x)-m\right]
\times
G_H[g_H(n\cdot x,n\cdot y,\kappa)]
=
0.
~\nonumber \\
\

\begin{eqnarray}
i(\gamma\cdot n)\frac{d}{d(n\cdot x)}g_H(n\cdot x,n\cdot
y,\kappa)+\gamma\cdot\kappa+\gamma\cdot A(n\cdot x)-m
=
0.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
g_H(n\cdot x,n\cdot y,\kappa)
=
i\frac{\gamma\cdot n}{n^2}\int_{n\cdot y}^{n\cdot x}d(n\cdot\xi)
[\gamma\cdot\kappa+\gamma\cdot A(n\cdot\xi)-m].
\label{argument}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
G_H(x_0,y_0,\vec k)
&=&
\lim_{N\rightarrow\infty}
\sum_{l=0}^N
~\sum_{n_1=0}^{N-1}\sum_{n_2=n_1+1}^{N-1}...\sum_{n_l=n_{l-1}+1}^{N-1}
~\nonumber \\
&~&
\prod_{L=0}^{n_1-1}
\left(1+i\gamma^0\Delta\xi^{(L)}_0[\gamma^j k_j-m]\right)
\times
\left[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi^{(n_1)}_0)\Delta\xi^{(n_1)}_0\right]
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
\prod_{L=n_1+1}^{n_2-1}
\left(1+i\gamma^0\Delta\xi^{(L)}_0[\gamma^j k_j-m]\right)
\times
\left[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi^{(n_2)}_0)\Delta\xi^{(n_2)}_0\right]
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
...
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
\prod_{L=n_{l-1}+1}^{n_l-1}
\left(1+i\gamma^0\Delta\xi^{(L)}_0[\gamma^j k_j-m]\right)
\times
\left[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi^{(n_{l-1})}_0)\Delta\xi^{(n_{l-1})}_0\right]
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
\prod_{L=n_l+1}^{N-1}
\left(1+i\gamma^0\Delta\xi^{(L)}_0[\gamma^j k_j-m]\right).
\label{resummation}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
G_H(x_0,y_0,\vec k)
&=&
\sum_{l=0}^\infty
\int_{y_0}^{x_0}d\xi_1\int^{\xi_1}_{y_0}d\xi_2...\int^{\xi_{l-1}}_{y_0}d\xi_l
~\nonumber \\
&~&
\exp\left\{i\gamma^0[\gamma^j k_j-m](x_0-\xi_1)\right\}
\times
\left[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_1)\right]
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
\exp\left\{i\gamma^0[\gamma^j k_j-m](\xi_1-\xi_2)\right\}
\times
\left[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_2)\right]
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
...
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
\exp\left\{i\gamma^0[\gamma^j k_j-m](\xi_{l-1}-\xi_l)\right\}
\times
\left[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_l)\right]
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
\exp\left\{i\gamma^0[\gamma^j k_j-m](\xi_l-y_0)\right\}.
\label{explizit}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
G_H(x_0,y_0,\vec k)
=
G_H^0(x_0-y_0,\vec k)
{\cal P}\exp\left\{
\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_0
G_H^0(y_0-\xi_0,\vec k)
[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)]
G_H^0(\xi_0-y_0,\vec k)
\right\}.
~\nonumber \\
\

\begin{eqnarray}
G_H(x_0,y_0,\vec k)
&=&
G^0_H(x_0-y_0,\vec k)
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_0
G^0_H(x_0-\xi_0,\vec k)
[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)]
G^0_H(\xi_0-y_0,\vec k)
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_0\int^{\xi_0}_{y_0}d\eta_0
G^0_H(x_0-\xi_0,\vec k)
[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)]
G^0_H(\xi_0-\eta_0,\vec k)
\times
~\nonumber \\
&&\times
[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\eta_0)]
G^0_H(\eta_0-y_0,\vec k)
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
...~.
\label{pertexpa}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
i\gamma^0G_R(x_0,y_0,\vec k)
&=&
\theta(x_0-y_0)G^0_H(x_0-y_0,\vec k)
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
\int_{x_0}^{y_0}d\xi_0
\theta(x_0-\xi_0)G^0_H(x_0-\xi_0,\vec k)
[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)]
\times
~\nonumber \\
&&\times
\theta(\xi_0-y_0)G^0_H(\xi_0-y_0,\vec k)
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
\int_{x_0}^{y_0}d\xi_0\int_{\xi_0}^{y_0}d\eta_0
\theta(x_0-\xi_0)G^0_H(x_0-\xi_0,\vec k)
[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)]
\times
~\nonumber \\
&&\times
\theta(\xi_0-\eta_0)G^0_H(\xi_0-\eta_0,\vec k)
[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\eta_0)]
\times
~\nonumber \\
&&\times
\theta(\eta_0-y_0)G^0_H(\eta_0-y_0,\vec k)
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
...~.
\label{projprop}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
i\gamma^0G_R(x_0,y_0,\vec k)
&=&
i\gamma^0G^0_R(x_0-y_0,\vec k)
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
\int_{x_0}^{y_0}d\xi_0
i\gamma^0G^0_R(x_0-\xi_0,\vec k)
[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)]
i\gamma^0G^0_R(\xi_0-y_0,\vec k)
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
\int_{x_0}^{y_0}d\xi_0\int_{\xi_0}^{y_0}d\eta_0
i\gamma^0G^0_R(x_0-\xi_0,\vec k)
[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)]
i\gamma^0G^0_R(\xi_0-\eta_0,\vec k)
\times
~\nonumber \\
&&\times
[i\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\eta_0)]
i\gamma^0G^0_R(\eta_0-y_0,\vec k)
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
...~.
\label{resumt}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
G_H(x_0,y_0,\vec k)
&=&
{\cal P}\exp\left\{i\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_0\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)\right\}
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_0
{\cal P}\exp\left\{i\int^{y_0}_{\xi_0}d\theta_0\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\theta_0)\right\}
\{i\gamma^0[\gamma^jk_j-m]\}
\times
~\nonumber \\
&&\times
{\cal P}\exp\left\{i\int^{\xi_0}_{x_0}d\theta_0\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\theta_0)\right\}
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_0\int^{\xi_0}_{y_0}d\eta_0
{\cal P}\exp\left\{i\int^{y_0}_{\xi_0}d\theta_0\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\theta_0)\right\}
\{i\gamma^0[\gamma^jk_j-m]\}
\times
~\nonumber \\
&&\times
{\cal P}\exp\left\{i\int^{\xi_0}_{\eta_0}d\theta_0\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\theta_0)\right\}
\{i\gamma^0[\gamma^jk_j-m]\}
\times
~\nonumber \\
&&\times
{\cal P}\exp\left\{i\int^{\eta_0}_{x_0}d\theta_0\gamma^0\gamma\cdot A(\theta_0)\right\}
+
~\nonumber \\
&+&
...~.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&
\lim_{N\rightarrow\infty}
G_H^{A_N}(x_0,y_0,\vec k)
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
\lim_{N\rightarrow\infty}
\prod_{\nu=0}^N   
\exp\left\{
i\gamma^0\int^{\xi_\nu}_{\xi_{\nu+1}}d\xi_0[\gamma^jk_j+\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)-m]
\right\}
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
\lim_{N\rightarrow\infty}
\prod_{\nu=0}^N   
\left\{
1+i\gamma^0(\xi_\nu-\xi_{\nu+1})[\gamma^jk_j+\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)-m]
+
{\cal O}\left(\frac{(x_0-y_0)^2}{N^2}\right)
\right\}
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
{\cal P}\exp\left\{i\gamma^0\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_0[\gamma^jk_j+\gamma\cdot A(\xi_0)-m]\right\}
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
G_H(x_0,y_0,\vec k)
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Delta G_H^A
&=&
G_H^{A_0}(0,2\Delta,\vec k)-G_H^{A_1}(0,2\Delta,\vec k)
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
G_H^{A_0}(0,2\Delta,\vec k)
-
G_H^{A_0}(0,\Delta,\vec k)G_H^{A_0}(\Delta,2\Delta,\vec k)
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Delta G_H^A
&=&
\exp\left\{
g_H(0,2\Delta,\vec k)
\right\}
-
\exp\left\{
g_H(0,2\Delta,\vec k)
+
[g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k),g_H(\Delta,2\Delta,\vec k)]
+
{\cal O}(\Delta^4)
\right\}
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
-[g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k),g_H(\Delta,2\Delta,\vec k)]
+
{\cal O}(\Delta^4)
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
-[g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k),g_H(0,2\Delta,\vec k)]
+
{\cal O}(\Delta^4)
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
-[g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k),dg_H(0,\Delta,\vec k)/d\Delta]\Delta
+
{\cal O}(\Delta^4).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Delta G_H
&=&
1+2g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k)
-
[1+g_H(0,\Delta/2,\vec k)][1+g_H(0,3\Delta/2,\vec k)]
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
[2g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k)-g_H(0,\Delta/2,\vec k)-g_H(0,3\Delta/2,\vec k)]
-
~\nonumber \\
&&-
g_H(0,\Delta/2,\vec k)g_H(0,3\Delta/2,\vec k)
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
-
g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k)^2
+
[g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k),dg_H(0,\Delta,\vec k)/d\Delta]\Delta/2
+
{\cal O}(\Delta^2).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
G_H(x_-,y_-;k_-,\vec k_T)
=
\left(
\gamma_+
-
\gamma_-\gamma_+
[2k_-+A_-(x_-)]^{-1}
\{\vec\gamma_T\cdot[\vec k_T+\vec A_T(x_-)]-m\}
\right)
\times
~~~~~~\nonumber \\
\times
{\cal P}\exp\left(
\frac{i}{2}\int_{y_-}^{x_-}d\xi_-\left\{
[2k_-+A_-(\xi_-)]^{-1}[|\vec k_T+\vec A_T(\xi_-)|^2+m^2]
-A_+(\xi_-)
\right\}\right).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{{\cal T}}(q,p)
&=&
(2\pi)^3\delta^{(3)}(\vec q-\vec p)
\times
~\nonumber \\
&&\times
\left[
\gamma\cdot A(q_0-p_0)
+
\int dx_0dy_0e^{+iq_0x_0}e^{-ip_0y_0}
\gamma\cdot A(x_0) G_R(x_0,y_0,\vec p) \gamma\cdot A(y_0)
\right]
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
(2\pi)^3\delta^{(3)}(\vec q-\vec p)
{{\cal T}}(q_0,p_0)
=
(2\pi)^3\delta^{(3)}(\vec q-\vec p)
\left[
{{\cal T}^B}(q_0,p_0)
+
{{\cal T}^{NB}}(q_0,p_0)
\right],
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal P}\exp\left\{\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_0[B(\xi_0)+C(\xi_0)]\right\}
&=&
\sum_{l=0}^\infty
\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_1\int^{\xi_1}_{y_0}d\xi_2...\int^{\xi_{l-1}}_{y_0}d\xi_l
~\nonumber \\
&~&
{\cal P}\exp\left\{\int_{\xi_1}^{x_0}d\xi_0 B(\xi_0)\right\}
C(\xi_1)
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
{\cal P}\exp\left\{\int_{\xi_2}^{\xi_1}d\xi_0B(\xi_0)\right\}
C(\xi_2)
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
...
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
{\cal P}\exp\left\{\int_{\xi_l}^{\xi_{l-1}}d\xi_0 B(\xi_0)\right\}
C(\xi_l)
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
{\cal P}\exp\left\{\int_{y_0}^{\xi_l}d\xi_0 B(\xi_0)\right\}.
\

G_H^{A_0}(0,2\Delta,\vec k)
-
G_H^{A_0}(0,\Delta,\vec k)G_H^{A_0}(\Delta,2\Delta,\vec k)
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Delta G_H^A
&=&
\exp\left\{
g_H(0,2\Delta,\vec k)
\right\}
-
\exp\left\{
g_H(0,2\Delta,\vec k)
+
[g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k),g_H(\Delta,2\Delta,\vec k)]
+
{\cal O}(\Delta^4)
\right\}
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
-[g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k),g_H(\Delta,2\Delta,\vec k)]
+
{\cal O}(\Delta^4)
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
-[g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k),g_H(0,2\Delta,\vec k)]
+
{\cal O}(\Delta^4)
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
-[g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k),dg_H(0,\Delta,\vec k)/d\Delta]\Delta
+
{\cal O}(\Delta^4).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Delta G_H
&=&
1+2g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k)
-
[1+g_H(0,\Delta/2,\vec k)][1+g_H(0,3\Delta/2,\vec k)]
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
[2g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k)-g_H(0,\Delta/2,\vec k)-g_H(0,3\Delta/2,\vec k)]
-
~\nonumber \\
&&-
g_H(0,\Delta/2,\vec k)g_H(0,3\Delta/2,\vec k)
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
-
g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k)^2
+
[g_H(0,\Delta,\vec k),dg_H(0,\Delta,\vec k)/d\Delta]\Delta/2
+
{\cal O}(\Delta^2).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
G_H(x_-,y_-;k_-,\vec k_T)
=
\left(
\gamma_+
-
\gamma_-\gamma_+
[2k_-+A_-(x_-)]^{-1}
\{\vec\gamma_T\cdot[\vec k_T+\vec A_T(x_-)]-m\}
\right)
\times
~~~~~~\nonumber \\
\times
{\cal P}\exp\left(
\frac{i}{2}\int_{y_-}^{x_-}d\xi_-\left\{
[2k_-+A_-(\xi_-)]^{-1}[|\vec k_T+\vec A_T(\xi_-)|^2+m^2]
-A_+(\xi_-)
\right\}\right).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{{\cal T}}(q,p)
&=&
(2\pi)^3\delta^{(3)}(\vec q-\vec p)
\times
~\nonumber \\
&&\times
\left[
\gamma\cdot A(q_0-p_0)
+
\int dx_0dy_0e^{+iq_0x_0}e^{-ip_0y_0}
\gamma\cdot A(x_0) G_R(x_0,y_0,\vec p) \gamma\cdot A(y_0)
\right]
=
~\nonumber \\
&=&
(2\pi)^3\delta^{(3)}(\vec q-\vec p)
{{\cal T}}(q_0,p_0)
=
(2\pi)^3\delta^{(3)}(\vec q-\vec p)
\left[
{{\cal T}^B}(q_0,p_0)
+
{{\cal T}^{NB}}(q_0,p_0)
\right],
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal P}\exp\left\{\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_0[B(\xi_0)+C(\xi_0)]\right\}
&=&
\sum_{l=0}^\infty
\int^{x_0}_{y_0}d\xi_1\int^{\xi_1}_{y_0}d\xi_2...\int^{\xi_{l-1}}_{y_0}d\xi_l
~\nonumber \\
&~&
{\cal P}\exp\left\{\int_{\xi_1}^{x_0}d\xi_0 B(\xi_0)\right\}
C(\xi_1)
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
{\cal P}\exp\left\{\int_{\xi_2}^{\xi_1}d\xi_0B(\xi_0)\right\}
C(\xi_2)
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
...
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
{\cal P}\exp\left\{\int_{\xi_l}^{\xi_{l-1}}d\xi_0 B(\xi_0)\right\}
C(\xi_l)
\times
~\nonumber \\
&\times&
{\cal P}\exp\left\{\int_{y_0}^{\xi_l}d\xi_0 B(\xi_0)\right\}.
\
